name: Witness & Write
description:
Take a walk and be mindful of the environment to get inspired. Then write!

Witness & Write is inspired with the mindfulness practice of witnessing, where one states everything they see in simple terms to enter the moment. Once in that state it's time to write! Or if you've been inspired before that time get to it!

Note: The game will not save your writing, so be sure to do that yourself.
